title: Kerolin hat-trick sees Man City crush Chelsea title hopes
body_text:
Kerolin hat-trick sees Man City crush Chelsea title hopes
This content is not available in your location.
There was an error
A hat-trick from Kerolin sees Manchester City sweep Chelsea aside in an emphatic victory, giving them a dominant lead at the top of the WSL table.
MATCH REPORT: Manchester City 5-1 Chelsea
Available to UK users only.
